Dgame.Graphics.Spritesheet



class Spritesheet: Dgame.Graphics.Sprite.Sprite;
Sprite Sheet extends Sprite. Sprite Sheet has, besides the texture, even a viewport and acts as a Texture Atlas.

Author:
rschuett

this();
CTor

this(Texture tex);
CTor

this(Texture tex, const FloatRect viewport);
CTor

void setViewport(ref const FloatRect viewport);
Set or replace the current viewport. This Viewport is also set for the Texture.

void setViewport(const FloatRect viewport);
Rvalue version

inout inout(FloatRect)* fetchViewport();
Get mutable access to the current Viewport.

const pure nothrow ref const(FloatRect) getViewport();
Get const access of the current Viewport.

float[4] slideViewport(FloatRect* viewport = null);
Slides/moves the current Viewport of the Texture. So the next area of the Texture atlas will be drawn. With the optional parameter another Viewport as the current will be used. Returns the coordinates and size of the new area as static array.
